title: Engine Overheating
description: The engine temperature exceeds normal operating levels, indicating potential coolant issues.

title: Hydraulic Leak
description: Visible hydraulic fluid leaking from hoses, which may lead to pressure loss and equipment failure.

title: Electrical Failure
description: The electrical system is not responding, causing operational disruptions and safety risks.

title: Tire Damage
description: Severe wear and tear or punctures detected in the tires, requiring immediate replacement.

title: Transmission Issues
description: Problems with gear shifting or unusual noises from the transmission, suggesting potential failure.

title: Fuel System Blockage
description: Blockage in the fuel lines causing reduced engine performance and efficiency.

title: Cooling System Failure
description: Failure in the cooling system leading to increased risk of engine overheating.

title: Belt Wear
description: Significant wear on drive belts, which may affect machinery performance.

title: Brake Malfunction
description: Unresponsive or spongy brakes, posing a safety risk during operation.

title: Exhaust Emissions Problem
description: Increased exhaust emissions indicating potential engine tuning or catalytic converter issues.

title: Control Panel Error
description: Error messages on the control panel, indicating malfunction in machinery operation.

title: Chassis Damage
description: Visible damage to the chassis structure that may compromise stability and safety.

title: Hydraulic System Failure
description: Loss of hydraulic power affecting functionality and efficiency.

title: Torque Converter Issues
description: Problems with the torque converter leading to reduced transmission efficiency.

title: PTO Malfunction
description: Power Take-Off (PTO) not engaging, affecting attachment performance.
